title: My account password got hacked
body: I tried signing in using my normal password and it didn't work. I tried changing my password word but it just showed up as invalid. Please help!!

replies.body: Depending on what kind of error message you're getting when you try to sign in would mean a couple of different things. If the client is saying incorrect username or password then there's a chance that someone else found their way onto your account. If that's the case, reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap to make sure your account is safe!
